moves.1. e4: So I start with my trusty e4
moves.2. Nc3: The Closed Sicilian, later the Grand Prix
moves.5. Bb5+: I like this variation though the GK Database calls Bc4 most popular
moves.6. a4: I thought a lot about this move, then I decided that it was best
moves.8... Ng4: Setting up an attack and attacking my Bishop
moves.9... a6: Trying to set up a trade
moves.11... Bd7: Bringing his army to the kingside
moves.16... O-O-O: Opposite castling leads to an exciting.
moves.17. Nd5: Closing in on the king and attacking the queen
moves.18... Kb8 19. Ba5: Bringing my pieces to the king with tempo
moves.20... Rxc7 21. Qxc7+ Ka7 22. Qc5+ Kb8 23: Right here I messed up on my ipad. I meant Qc4
moves.24... Kb8 25. Qc7+ Ka7 26. Qc4 Rc8 27. Q: Looking to simplify cause I am ahead
moves.30... exd6 31. Nxf7 Bxe5 32. c3: The only reason that I did not take the Rook was to allow the freedom of my b-pawn and avoiding future attacks on my Rook from the DSB
